author: cbs8
title: Vicksburg mayor plans private meeting with firefighters
text:
VICKSBURG, Miss. (AP) - Vicksburg Mayor George Flaggs Jr. says he's inviting the city's firefighters to a meeting that will be closed to their chief, the aldermen and the media.
The Vicksburg Post reports ( http://bit.ly/1RvKQMi ) Flaggs sent a letter to firefighters, saying he will be available for two hours Saturday at the City Hall annex to discuss issues in the Fire Department.
Among other things, the department has experienced problems with short-staffing and a big overtime budget.
Flaggs says there has been "a disconnect in the communication" between firefighters and himself.
Chief Charles Atkins says he's disappointed Flaggs would exclude him and others from the meeting. The chief says he previously asked the mayor to communicate through him to the firefighters. Atkins says it appears Flaggs doesn't trust him to do that.
Information from: The Vicksburg Post, http://www.vicksburgpost.com
